title: Week 8 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Iron Pants - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/26
description:
Week 8 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 8 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping for each position, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 26th, 2021.
  
 (01:30) - Monday Night Recap: Saints at Seahawks
 (07:05) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (15:35) - NFL News
 (24:55) - Week 8 Waivers
 (25:30) - WR Waivers
 (41:00) - RB Waivers
 (50:30) - TE Waivers
 (54:45) - DST Streamers
 (58:25) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
